extension.name: JElastislide
extension.author: Navjinder Kainthrai
extension.description:
JElastislide

A Joomla Responsive Image Carousel

Based on Elastislide by Codrops

Developed by Navjinder.com

field.description: Horizontal or Vertical

field.description: Enter the value between 1 to 10
